message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe is worth more than $150 to us. Considering its unique features and benefits, I would like to propose a starting price of $200. This offer is valid for the next 3 rounds. Let me know if this is within your budget or if you'd like to discuss further.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am looking for something within a $100 budget. I would like to make a counteroffer of $150 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. While I understand your budget constraints, I must respectfully decline it. Our product offers exceptional value and quality. I would like to counter with an offer of $180 for the product. This is a final offer, considering our costs and the value we believe the product holds.
I appreciate your response, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to make a counteroffer of $160 for the product. I hope this aligns better with both our interests.

Thank you for your latest counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. In light of our previous discussions and the value of our product, I am prepared to consider an offer of $170 for the product. This is my final offer in this negotiation.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I've been considering the value of your product and I would like to make a counteroffer of $165 for the product. I hope this proposal is within your considerations.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to accept an offer of $168 for the product. This is my final offer in this negotiation.
